message: Retrieved all application questions in this page

validations.flxError_Message__c: Date should be in format of dd/mm/yyyy
You must be 18 or over to apply
Year must be not more than 100 years ago
Year must be not more than 100 years ago

Questions.flxLabelPriorQuestion__c: How much do you want to borrow?

validations.flxError_Message__c: The maximum you can apply for is £30,000
Have you considered any delivery charges you might need to pay in the loan amount requested?
This means your annual income is £ after tax. Please double-check that this is correct.

Just checking this is your net monthly income?
If you’re paid weekly, multiply your weekly take-home pay by 4.33.
If you’re paid fortnightly, multiply your fortnightly take-home pay by 2.16.
Your income must be £1,000 or higher to apply

Just checking that you have included all monthly expenses including mortgage or rent, loan payments, cost of living for you and any dependants and other regular costs such as travel costs, child maintenance and insurance premiums
You can only have between 0 and 20 dependents

Questions.flxLabelPriorQuestion__c: Your monthly rent or mortgage payment
Questions.flxQuestionMoreInfo__c: Please enter your share of housing costs that you pay each month.

validations.flxError_Message__c: Just checking that you have entered your monthly mortgage payment or rent payment here. Thanks

Just to check you have entered the total amount of all your contractual payments such as loans, credit cards, hire purchase etc. and also included any other regular monthly commitments such as child maintenance.
Just to check you’ve included a total amount for day to day living expenses such as food, clothing, utilitiy bills, travel costs, insurances and entertainment for you and any dependents. Thanks

Questions.flxLabelPriorQuestion__c: I agree that humm may communicate with me and send important documents (including documents under the Consumer Credit Act 1974) by email at the address I have provided, and the email may provide the document in the form of an attachment or a link to the document

Tick here to confirm you acknowledge we will be sharing your personal data with one or more Credit Reference Agencies (CRAs) who will perform checks using public sources of data and this WILL LEAVE A FOOTPRINT on your records at the CRAs which will be visible to other providers of credit/other lenders/other organisations should they perform checks (full details are in our Privacy Policy)
